intro: Sphagneticola annua, commonly known as African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the Asteraceae family and is characterized by its showy, violet-colored flowers that bloom in clusters. The plant has heart-shaped leaves that are usually dark green and glossy. It thrives in well-drained soil and requires moderate sunlight to flourish. Sphagneticola annua is popular as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and ease of care.
